item.description: SINGLES MEMORIAL WEEKEND PICNIC at Gail Fuller's beach cottage at Sound View, Old Lyme starting at 2 pm. You can just hang out or walk on the beach. For the picnic, bring a salad, entree, or dessert to share. Admission $10. If you don't want to bring food, cost $15. To reserve, call Gail in Bristol 860-582-8229 or Old Lyme 860-434-6426. Directions to 46 Swan Ave.: Rt. 9S to I 95N, just over bridge take Exit 70, ramp end turn right onto Rt. 156, go 5 miles, turn right after Citgo gas station onto Swan Ave., after 1st stop sign, 3rd house on left. You cannot park on street. There is a permitted parking lot immediately past my house on the left. Tell them that you are going to my party and you will only be charged $5 (the normal rate is $15).
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside waiting for you.
item.why: You'll love it because we offer a relaxed, comfortable, welcoming atmosphere for you and other singles to socialize and have fun!

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Memorial Weekend Picnic
